mapper.select: SELECT P.PA_NAME, P.PA_PH, P.PA_INSR_YN, PY.PAY_NO, PY.PAY_STATE, PY.PAY_TOTALMN, PY.PAY_STDT, PR.PR_NO, PR.PR_PAYMN FROM PATIENT P JOIN PAY PY ON P.PA_NO = PY.PA_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_RECORD PR ON PY.PAY_NO = PR.PAY_NO ORDER BY PY.PAY_NO DESC

SELECT P.PA_NO, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_INSR_YN, P.PA_ADD1, P.PA_ADD2, P.PZ_ZIP, PY.PAY_NO, PY.PAY_TOTALMN, PY.PAY_STATE, PR.PR_NO, PR.PR_PAYDT, PR.PR_PAYTYPE, PR.PR_PAYMN, R.RCT_CLINIC, R.RCT_ADMI, R.RCT_DIET, R.RCT_MEDIACT, R.RCT_MEDI, R.RCT_SURGERY, R.RCT_TEST, R.RCT_VIDEO, R.RCT_MEDIDEV, R.RCT_RADIO, R.RCT_PHYSIC, R.RCT_BLOOD, R.RCT_CT, R.RCT_MRI, R.RCT_PET, R.RCT_ULTRA, R.RCT_TOTAL, R.RCT_INJEACT, R.RCT_INJE FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN PAY PY ON P.PA_NO = PY.PA_NO LEFT JOIN PAY_RECORD PR ON PY.PAY_NO = PR.PAY_NO LEFT JOIN RECEIPT R ON PY.PAY_NO = R.PAY_NO WHERE PY.PAY_NO = #{payNo} ORDER BY PR.PR_PAYDT ASC

SELECT 'PY' || NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(PAY_NO), 3) + 1, '0000')), '0001') AS PAY_NO FROM PAY
INSERT INTO PAY (PAY_NO, PA_NO, CLINIC_NO, ADMI_NO, PAY_STATE, PAY_TOTALMN, PAY_STDT) VALUES (#{payNo}, #{paNo}, #{clinicNo}, #{admiNo}, 'PMYN01', #{payTotalmn}, sysdate)

SELECT 'PR' || NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(PR_NO), 3) + 1, '0000')), '0001') AS PR_NO FROM PAY_RECORD
INSERT INTO PAY_RECORD(PR_NO, PAY_NO, PR_PAYDT, PR_PAYTYPE, PR_PAYMN) VALUES(#{prNo}, #{payNo}, sysdate, #{prPaytype}, #{prPaymn})

INSERT INTO RECEIPT (PAY_NO, RCT_CLINIC, RCT_ADMI, RCT_DIET, RCT_MEDIACT, RCT_MEDI, RCT_SURGERY, RCT_TEST, RCT_VIDEO, RCT_MEDIDEV, RCT_PHYSIC, RCT_BLOOD, RCT_CT, RCT_MRI, RCT_ULTRA, RCT_TOTAL, RCT_INJEACT, RCT_INJE) VALUES (#{payNo}, #{rctClinic}, #{rctAdmi}, #{rctDiet}, #{rctMediact}, #{rctMedi}, #{rctSurgery}, #{rctTest}, #{rctVideo}, #{rctMedidev}, #{rctPhysic}, #{rctBlood}, #{rctCt}, #{rctMri}, #{rctUltra}, #{rctTotal}, #{rctInjeact}, #{rctInje})
mapper.select:
SELECT A.RCT_ADMI ,B.RCT_DIET, C.RCT_MEDIACT, D.RCT_MEDI, E.RCT_INJEACT, F.RCT_INJE, G.RCT_SURGERY, H.RCT_TEST, I.RCT_VIDEO, J.RCT_MEDIDEV, K.RCT_PHYSIC, L.RCT_BLOOD, M.RCT_CT, N.RCT_MRI, O.RCT_ULTRA, NVL((A.RCT_ADMI + B.RCT_DIET + C.RCT_MEDIACT + D.RCT_MEDI + E.RCT_INJEACT + F.RCT_INJE + G.RCT_SURGERY + H.RCT_TEST + I.RCT_VIDEO + J.RCT_MEDIDEV + K.RCT_PHYSIC + L.RCT_BLOOD + M.RCT_CT + N.RCT_MRI + O.RCT_ULTRA), 0) AS RCT_TOTAL FROM
( SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADRM_ROOMNO, 1, 1) = '3' THEN (DATEDIFF * 221400) WHEN SUBSTR(ADRM_ROOMNO, 1, 1) = '4' THEN (DATEDIFF * 171500) WHEN SUBSTR(ADRM_ROOMNO, 1, 1) = '5' THEN (DATEDIFF * 124000) ELSE 0 END AS RCT_ADMI FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(ADMI_OUTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(ADMI_INDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AS DATEDIFF, ADRM_ROOMNO FROM ADMISSION_CHART WHERE ADMI_NO = #{admiNo} ) ) A,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(MEAL_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_DIET FROM DIET D LEFT JOIN MEAL M ON D.MEAL_CD = M.MEAL_CD WHERE ADMI_NO = #{admiNo} ) B,
( SELECT NVL((COUNT(MO.MEDI_CD) * 1500), 0) AS RCT_MEDIACT FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON CC.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND M.MEDI_DETAIL != '기타 처방' AND M.MEDI_DETAIL != '주사' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) C,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN MO.MDOD_QT != 0 THEN M.MEDI_PRICE * MO.MDOD_DAY * MO.MDOD_PER * MO.MDOD_DOSE / MO.MDOD_QT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS RCT_MEDI FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON CC.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND M.MEDI_DETAIL != '기타 처방' AND M.MEDI_DETAIL != '주사' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) D,
( SELECT NVL((COUNT(MO.MEDI_CD) * 2000), 0) AS RCT_INJEACT FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON CC.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND M.MEDI_DETAIL = '주사' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) E,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(M.MEDI_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_INJE FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON CC.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND M.MEDI_DETAIL = '주사' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) F,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(MEDI_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_SURGERY FROM CLINIC_CHART C JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON C.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND MEDI_DETAIL = '기타 처방' WHERE C.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) G,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_TEST FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = '소변검사' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) H,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_VIDEO FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND (TEST_NM = 'X-RAY' OR TEST_NM = '골밀도 검사') WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) I,
( SELECT NVL( SUM( CASE WHEN T.TM_CD = 'TRMT001' THEN 33000 WHEN T.TM_CD = 'TRMT006' THEN 18000 ELSE 0 END ),0 ) AS RCT_MEDIDEV FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TREATMENT_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TREATMENT T ON TOD.TM_CD = T.TM_CD WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) J,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TM_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_PHYSIC FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TREATMENT_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TREATMENT T ON TOD.TM_CD = T.TM_CD WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) K,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_BLOOD FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = '피검사' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) L,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_CT FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = 'CT' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) M,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_MRI FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = 'MRI' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) N,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_ULTRA FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = '초음파' WHERE CC.ADMI_CD = #{admiNo} ) O

SELECT 19000 AS RCT_CLINIC , A.RCT_INJEACT, B.RCT_INJE, C.RCT_SURGERY, D.RCT_TEST, E.RCT_VIDEO, F.RCT_MEDIDEV, G.RCT_PHYSIC, H.RCT_BLOOD, I.RCT_CT, J.RCT_MRI, K.RCT_ULTRA, NVL((19000 + A.RCT_INJEACT + B.RCT_INJE + C.RCT_SURGERY + D.RCT_TEST + E.RCT_VIDEO + F.RCT_MEDIDEV + G.RCT_PHYSIC + H.RCT_BLOOD + I.RCT_CT + J.RCT_MRI + K.RCT_ULTRA), 0) AS RCT_TOTAL FROM ( SELECT (COUNT(MO.MEDI_CD) * 2000) AS RCT_INJEACT FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON CC.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND M.MEDI_DETAIL = '주사' WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) A,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(M.MEDI_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_INJE FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON CC.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND M.MEDI_DETAIL = '주사' WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) B,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(MEDI_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_SURGERY FROM CLINIC_CHART C JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON C.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO JOIN MEDICINE M ON MO.MEDI_CD = M.MEDI_CD AND MEDI_DETAIL = '기타 처방' WHERE C.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) C,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_TEST FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = '소변검사' WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) D,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_VIDEO FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND (TEST_NM = 'X-RAY' OR TEST_NM = '골밀도 검사') WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) E,
( SELECT NVL( SUM( CASE WHEN T.TM_CD = 'TRMT001' THEN 33000 WHEN T.TM_CD = 'TRMT006' THEN 18000 ELSE 0 END ),0 ) AS RCT_MEDIDEV FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TREATMENT_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TREATMENT T ON TOD.TM_CD = T.TM_CD WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) F,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TM_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_PHYSIC FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TREATMENT_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TREATMENT T ON TOD.TM_CD = T.TM_CD WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) G,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_BLOOD FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = '피검사' WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) H,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_CT FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = 'CT' WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) I,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_MRI FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = 'MRI' WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) J,
( SELECT NVL(SUM(T.TEST_PRICE), 0) AS RCT_ULTRA FROM CLINIC_CHART CC JOIN TEST_ORDER TOD ON CC.CLINIC_NO = TOD.CLINIC_NO JOIN TEST T ON TOD.TEST_CD = T.TEST_CD AND TEST_NM = '초음파' WHERE CC.CLINIC_NO = #{clinicNo} ) K
